# About Me

I'm a Research Assistant at the Lahore University of Management Sciences.

My goal is to be contribute towards democratizing and building efficient Machine Learning systems that empower underrepresented populations, and continuously improve upon existing technologies.

Some of my interests include (but are not limited to)

- **Efficient ML**: Quantization, Pruning, Distillation, Parameter-Efficient Finetuning, TinyML

- **Multimodal Representation Learning**: Visual Language Models, Diffusion Models, Text-to-Speech/Speech-to-Text Models

- **Safety, Fairness, and Out-of-Domain Performance**: OOD Detection, Inductive Biases of Discriminative and Generative Models, Social Biases of LLMs

- **Miscellaneous**: Mixture of Experts, Model Merging, Parallel Computing, Open-Source Software

You can find more details about my projects, relevant experiences (industry, research, and teaching), and activities outside academia in my [CV](files/cv.pdf).
